patthana8.49:1.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.49:1.1_1: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.49:1.1_2: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso ca nanokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.49:2.1_0: Nanokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.49:3.1_0: Nokilesañca nanokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.49:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
